newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Solid Group sets 0.15 peso cash payout.
newsitem.headline: Solid Group sets 0.15 peso cash payout.

text.p: Solid Group Inc said on Thursday its board has declared a 0.15 peso cash dividend to stockholders of record as of April 22, 1997.
This is the first time Solid Group will be granting cash dividends, which will be payable on May 31, 1997. Last year, the company did not pay any dividend.
It is the local manufacturer and distributor for consumer electronic product makers Sony Corp and Aiwa Co Ltd.
Solid Group took over a dormant listed company, known as United Paracale Mining Corp, in June last year in order to be listed on the exchange.
